title: Bloody Mess Behind The Wheel
description: Most young people are conscientious citizens who drive defensively and obey all the applicable traffic laws. But there’s always going to be one or two bad apples in the bunch.
creator: The State Highway Patrol
altHero: aerial view of an intersection where a red car is swerving into the path of a semi-truck
alt1: hands on a steering wheel with two cars in front
alt2: car at an intersection where a cop is standing
alt3: two dudes screaming in a car
alt4: a smoldering three-car accident with text “Official state patrol footage”
